name: Data Pipeline with Schema Validation
description: Build ETL pipeline that processes CSV to JSON with strict validation: correct schema, no nulls, minimum record count
goal: Fix the data pipeline in pipeline.py to process input.csv into output.json. Requirements: (1) output must have exactly the fields [id, name, email, score, category], (2) no null/empty values allowed, (3) must process at least 100 valid records. Save validation report to artifacts/validation.json.
